00042 /* AES Counter with CBC-MAC (CCM) -- cf RFC 3610 for explanations of parameters. encryption is in place */

00045 /* AES Counter with CBC-MAC (CCM) encrypts and protects a data buffer. */

00047                                     const ubyte* nonce, ubyte* encData, ubyte4 eDataLength,
00048                                     const ubyte* authData, ubyte4 aDataLength, ubyte U[/*M*/]);
